nodes.text: The T-16 Skyhopper was a mixed alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. The yellow-colored cocktail was suitable for human consumption.

The T-16 Skyhopper is one of the alcoholic beverages that has been sold to customers at the Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge since its opening in 2019. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019. The menu's description reads, "Vodka, melon liqueur, kiwi, and half & half."
